snippet: Asian-Americans, some of them newly minted basketball fans, gathered Friday at Gatsby’s bar to watch Jeremy Lin’s performance.
abstract: Asian-American New Yorkers, some of them newly minted basketball fans, congregate at a Manhattan sports bar to cheer on New York Knicks sensation Jeremy Lin, one of the few Asian-Americans in NBA history who has come seemingly out of nowhere to champion a Knicks win streak.
lead_paragraph: Asian-Americans, some of them newly minted basketball fans, gathered Friday at Gatsby’s bar to watch Jeremy Lin’s performance.

headline.seo: At SoHo Bar, Jeremy Lin’s Fans Share His Heritage
headline.main: Sharing a Heritage With a New Knicks Star
headline.print_headline: At SoHo Bar, A New Star’s Fans Share His Heritage
